channel.title: 🎯 shortcuts on itslikesoup
channel.description: Recent content in 🎯 shortcuts on itslikesoup

item.title: 🎯 shortcuts report
item.description: used often esc == exit scope ⌘ n == new object ⌘ 0-9 == format text-style ⌘ ⇧ ↑/↓ == move content-block up/down ⌥ ↑/↓ == open/close toggle-text sporadically used ⌘ ⇧ c == change font color to last used intend to incorporate ⌘ ⇧ r == open relation-pane to fix breaks ⌘ - == zoom-out when i enter ⌘ 0 to format text-style: text, the same key combination also doubles as the output default zoom so i must use this shortcut following ⌘ 0 to zoom-out
